About.paragraph: I'm a Full Stack developer with a B.S. degree in Technology Management from UC Davis. Having a solid foundation in data structures and algorithms, front end development and agile software development has helped me to solve complex and challenging problems. As a developer, I always strive to learn new technologies to create efficient and elegant applications. Developing Apps is my passion, and I hope to positively impact people's lives. When I'm not coding, I enjoy working out, playing basketball, listening to music, and reading.

Projects.title: BeNatively
Projects.description: Next-Generation international ebook market place to buy or read
Projects.function: BeNatively helps readers to map ebooks between English and over 100 other languages and publishers to expand their audiences.
Projects.features: Email Authentication, Data Caching, Real Time Database
Projects.technologies: React, Javascript, Firebase Database, Google Cloud, NLP

Projects.title: InstantWeb
Projects.description: Instant Websites is to amplify the simplicity of creating apps
Projects.function: Allows owners to create apps with only description data entry
Projects.myRole: Sole Full Stack Web Developer from new project to the initial release.
Projects.features: React, JavaScript, Firebase Database, Firebase Function
Projects.technologies: Email Authentications, Real Time Database and Storage

Projects.title: SF Muni Bus Tracker
Projects.description: Make checking the San Francisco Muni Bus services easier
Projects.function: Provided real time tracking on the Map for the San Francisco Muni Buses
Projects.myRole: Sole Full Stack Web Developer from new project to the initial release.
Projects.features: Real Time Map Marker Animations, Network Reachability
Projects.technologies: React, React Native Expo, MapKit, NextBus services

Projects.title: Project Tracker
Projects.description: Inspired by Trello and Kanban Boards
Projects.function: Increased accessibility to track project tasks daily
Projects.myRole: Sole Full Stack Web Developer from new project to the initial release.
Projects.features: Customizable Built Tools, Real Time Database and Storage

Projects.title: ConfirmMe
Projects.description: Helped people to keep track of confirmations or appointments
Projects.function: Real time tracking for confirmation inside the messaging app
Projects.myRole: Sole Full Stack Web Developer from new project to the initial release.
Projects.features: In-app Real Time Messaging, Email, Google Authentication
Projects.technologies: React, Firebase Database, Authentication, and Host
